mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (name, teacher_id, teacher_name, college, team, create_time, remark) VALUES (#{name}, #{teacherId}, #{teacherName}, #{college}, #{team}, now(), #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET name = #{name}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, teacher_name = #{teacherName}, college = #{college}, team = #{team}, update_time = now(), remark = #{remark} where id=#{id}
